title: Electric field applied to hot ionized gas

content.description: A very hot gas composed of equal numbers of positive and negative ions is in a closed, thermally insulated container and is in thermal equilibrium at temperature T0. The figure above represents the initial distribution of the ions. A strong uniform electric field directed toward the bottom of the page is now created in and around the container, and the gas is allowed to reach a new thermal equilibrium at temperature T1.
content.question: Which of the following best represents a possible distribution of the ions at temperature T1?

choices.label: Option A shows 5 circles arranged in a scattered row near the top of the rectangle and 5 circles arranged in a scattered row near the bottom of the rectangle. The top row is arranged from left to right as positive, negative, positive, positive, positive, and negative. The bottom row is arranged from left to right as positive, negative, negative, negative, and positive.

Option B shows 3 circles containing positive signs arranged in a row along the very top of the rectangle and 2 circles containing negative signs arranged in a row just below, and in between, the 3 circles along the very top. 3 circles containing negative signs are arranged in a row along the very bottom of the rectangle and 2 circles containing positive signs are arranged in a row just above, and in between, the 3 circles along the very bottom.

Option C shows 5 circles containing negative signs arranged within the top half of the rectangle in a scattered pattern and 5 circles containing positive signs arranged within the bottom half of the rectangle in a scattered pattern.

Option D shows 5 circles containing positive signs arranged within the top half of the rectangle in a scattered pattern and 5 circles containing negative signs arranged within the bottom half of the rectangle in a scattered pattern.

content.answer: Option C shows 5 circles containing negative signs arranged within the top half of the rectangle in a scattered pattern and 5 circles containing positive signs arranged within the bottom half of the rectangle in a scattered pattern.
